name: Evelyn's Farm (itch)
description:
To save money for college, you and your friends Ivan and Lucy have agreed to help an old lady, Evelyn, with the harvest. What could possibly go wrong? As you pick pumpkins and apples, you notice a barn full of incomprehensible machines and a forest full of unfriendly creatures. Clearly, there's more to Evelyn than meets the eye...

Evelyn's Farm is a mysterious new adventure from the creator of Nano Empire. 

Features:

  • NOT a cozy farming sim
  • A nonlinear story with many possible endings
  • Idle gameplay: manage resources and make progress even while you're away
  • Gradually explore a vast, unexpected world
  • Partly inspired by a recent show set in Indiana...

Mature content: text-based violence and horror/disturbing themes.
